Package org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.mapping.config

Class CMappingConfiguration

java.lang.Object
org.eclipse.mosaic.fed.mapping.config.CMappingConfiguration
public class CMappingConfiguration extends Object
Class that contains options for the parametrization of the Mapping.

  • Field Details

    • scaleTraffic

      public double scaleTraffic
      Scales the traffic by the given factor. E.g. 2.0 would double the number of spawned vehicles

    • fixedOrder

      public boolean fixedOrder
      Determines if selection of a vehicles type when spawning follows a fixedOrder or stochastic model. When set to true the spawning-process will choose exactly the same types with every execution. When set to false the order of types may be different and selected weights will be reached more slowly.

    • start

      public Double start
      Defines the point in time to start spawning vehicles. If not set (default), all vehicles will be spawned according to the vehicles configuration. [s]

    • end

      public Double end
      Defines the point in time to end spawning vehicles. If not set (default), all vehicles will be spawned according to the vehicles configuration or until the simulation ends. [s]

    • adjustStartingTimes

      public boolean adjustStartingTimes
      If set to true and if the parameter start is set, the starting times of each spawner is adjusted accordingly, so that we shouldn't wait in case that simulation starting time and spawner starting time are widely spread out. All spawners before start will be completely ignored then.

    • randomizeFlows

      public boolean randomizeFlows
      If set to true, all flow definitions defined by vehicle spawners with more than 1 vehicle result in slightly randomized departure times. The specified `targetFlow` of the vehicle spawner is kept.

    • randomizeStartingTimes

      public boolean randomizeStartingTimes
      If set to true, the starting times of all vehicle spawner definitions are randomized by +-60 seconds.

    • randomizeWeights

      public boolean randomizeWeights
      If set to true, the configured weights of all types are slightly randomized by +-1% of the sum of all weights.

  • Constructor Details

    • CMappingConfiguration

      public CMappingConfiguration()
